ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews the Fast Food King; One August Day in the Nursing Home; Multi-Mini-Plex; Star Trek Funnies; The Inspection; Vampire Gags; Court Room Capers; Aiming Gun Ads at Specific Groups; One Fine Day at the Amusement Park; Star Drek V: The Finite Frontier; At the Heavy Metal Concert...; Cracked Christmas Party; Cracked Dinosaur True or Fossil Quiz?; America's Least Wanted; The Library; The Abyssmal; One Fine Day in Nantucket
ComicInfo.Summary:
The castle needs a volunteer to feed the queen's cats -- or rather, be fed to the queen's pet lions!
The guard goes through the Cracked Christmas party, determined to prove Hudd and Dini have disguised themselves as guests.
ComicInfo.Letterer: John Severin,Don Martin,Michael Ricigliano,Gary Fields,Vic Martin
